metadata.name: A Botanical Playground of Glitched Visions
metadata.description:
In "Symphonic Dreams of Nature: A Botanical Playground of Glitched Visions," Aya explores the intersection of the natural world and digital media. Using generative algorithms and custom shaders in TouchDesigner, glitched, fragmented shapes were created to dance and morph in response to random noise. These glitched animations represent the uncertainties and challenges of the future, while also highlighting the potential for creativity and innovation to evolve with them.

"Symphonic Dreams of Nature" alludes to the harmonious and fluid nature of the glitched visuals, which evoke a sense of stochastic yet symphonic movement. In this botanical playground of glitched visions, we can explore the beauty and potential in the unexpected and the unknown, and imagine new possibilities for the future.
